content.webTitle: Believe review – Brian Cox stars as Man United's Matt Busby

fields.headline: Believe review – Brian Cox stars as Man United's Matt Busby
fields.bodyText: Just when we thought Man United's stock couldn't fall any lower, here's an often cringeworthy "inspired by true events" supposition that sees the retired Matt Busby (Brian Cox) coaching the blond moppet who stole his wallet to under-12s glory. Early 80s pointers (Musical Youth, the miners' strike) are trowelled on to a formulaic plot: the school's cup final coincides with not just a major exam but Busby's birthday to boot. Cox's guardedly avuncular turn might have sustained a more rigorous endeavour, but the attempt to evoke the trauma of the Munich air disaster is rendered wholly insupportable by the trifling hooey around it.
